law.catch_line: An interim protective order, temporary protective order, and final protective order issued under thi...

text.section:
An interim protective order, temporary protective order, and final protective order issued under this subtitle shall state that a violation of the order may result in:
criminal prosecution; and
imprisonment or fine or both.
A temporary protective order and final protective order issued under this subtitle shall state that a violation of the order may result in a finding of contempt.
